android.name: Milk
android.content:
Apply some cold milk to eyebrows and leave it on for about 20
minutes.Wash off.Repeat twice everyday for 2 months.

android.name: Olive Oil
android.content:
Massage eyebrows with olive oil to thicken hair growth.Take care to
massage in the same direction as the growth.As a bonus, the existing
hair on the brow as well looks darker and softer with this massage.

android.name: Almond
android.content:
Soak a teaspoon of fenugreek seeds in water for
4 to 5 hours and make a paste.Apply on brows at bedtime.Wash off
in the morning.You can also mix almond oil to this paste.

android.name: Egg Yolk
android.content:
Apply egg yolk with finger tip or cotton balls on
your eyebrows and keep it for 15 to 20 minutes and then wash off.
